org.lcsim.detector.tracker.silicon

Class HpsTestRunSiSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.detector.DetectorElement
      • org.lcsim.detector.tracker.silicon.SiSensor
        • org.lcsim.detector.tracker.silicon.HpsSiSensor
          • org.lcsim.detector.tracker.silicon.HpsTestRunSiSensor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Identifiable, IDetectorElement

    public class HpsTestRunSiSensor
extends HpsSiSensor
    This class extends HpsSiSensor with conditions specific to HPS SVT half-modules (sensors) used during the test run. Each half-module is uniquely identified by an FPGA/Hybrid ID pair which is then related to calibration conditions such as baseline, noise gain etc.
